      Clones the array so that the calibrated color wont change with the given array

      • testColor

        public int testColor()
        Compares the given color to the 3 colors given during calibration.
        Returns:
        integer, either 0 indicating that the color fetched is closer to the gameboard color and 1 indicating it was closer to the player piece color and 2 indicating it was closer to the robot piece color
